text_logic_form: Find the area of the shaded shape.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the shaded shape.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the perimeter of the circle $C$ is $12$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
Point $C$ also lies on the line connecting $E$ and $H$.
Point $C$ also lies on the line connecting $J$ and $F$.
Point $A$ lies on the circle with center $C$ and radius $2$ units.
Point $B$ lies on the same circle as $A$.
Point $E$ lies on the same circle as $A$.
Point $F$ lies on the same circle as $A$.
Point $H$ lies on the same circle as $A$.
Point $J$ lies on the same circle as $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $AJ$, $JH$, $BH$, $BF$, $EF$, and $AE$ forming the polygon $AJHBEF$.
There are lines $AC$, $JC$, $HC$, $BC$, $FC$, $EC$ connecting the center of the circle $C$ to the vertices of the polygon.
There are lines $AB$, $EH$, and $FD$ forming the triangles inside the polygon.
circle_instances: There is a circle with center at point $C$.
